value.name: Video: Inmate Escapes Police Custody
value.description: The video shows 25-year-old Michael Maldonado making his escape ... As Head Of COPAThe head of Chicago's Civilian Office of Police Accountability (COPA) the group charged with oversight for ...

value.name: Loren LeBeau apologizes for Donovan Maldonado's death
value.description: "I just want to end by saying how proud Maria and I are to have given life to a perfect little man named Donovan Michael Maldonado," the father said. "He will forever be missed, but never forgotten.
